S08n2858:10206: śiṣyaṃ śrīvajrahuṃkāramudrayā sattvavajrādibhiś cādhiṣṭhāya mahāmudrayā tataḥ
S08n2858:10231: mālagāthābhir abhinandyādau tāvad udakābhiṣekena tato mudrābhiṣekena mukuṭapaṭṭavajrādhipatināmābhiṣekaiś
S08n2858:10235: valitavajrāṃjalinā praṇamyottamāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ datvā puṣpadyabhiṣekāś ca grāhyā
S08n2858:10245: nirdiṣṭeṣu sthāneṣu samayamudrābhis tasya kāye śrīvajrahuṃkārādīn nyasya | punar
S08n2858:10255: vajrādhipati tvām abhiṣiñcāmi dṛḍho me bhava jaḥ huṃ vaṃ hoḥ huṃ phaṭ iti | tata
S08n2858:10259: vijayakalaśād gṛhītvā dadyād idaṃ ca brūyāt ||
S08n2858:10274: ca mudrāṃ ca yady amaṇḍalino vadet ||
S08n2858:10585: likhet paṭhed vāpi dhārayed arthataḥ sadā ||
